A kọwatara ụkpụrụ Paris na nzukọ izizi nke mba ụwa na ụlọ ọrụ mba maka nkwalite na nchedo nke ikike mmadụ nke emere na Paris na ụbọchị asaa rụọ ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1991. Ndị United Nations Human Rights Commission nakweere ha site na Mkpebi 1992/54 nke afọ 1992, na site na UN General Assembly na Mkpebi 48/134 nke afọ 1993

Na mgbakwunye na ịgbanwere echiche banyere ndokwa ndị dị ugbu a, ndị sonyere na ogbako ahụ depụtara usoro ndụmọdụ zuru oke banyere ọrụ, nhazi, ọnọdụ na ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ruuru mmadụ (NHRIs). Ndị a wuru na ụkpụrụ ndị Geneva Seminar on National and Local Institutions for the Promotion and Protection of Human Rights' nke mepụtara 'Guidelines on the Structure and Functioning of National and Local Institutions for the Promotion and Protection of Human Rights'
Ụkpụrụ Paris nke 1993 na-achịkwa ọnọdụ na ịrụ ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ mba maka nchebe na ịkwalite ikike mmadụ nke a maara dị ka National Human Rights Institutions
Ụkpụrụ Paris depụtara ụfọdụ ọrụ na ibu ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ruuru mmadụ nke mba:
Ịgbaso ụkpụrụ Paris bụ okacha mkpa n'si ihe achọrọ nke usoro nzere ntozu nke na-achịkwa ohere NHRI na United Nations Human Rights Council na ndị ọzọ
Nke a bụ usoro nyocha nke ndị ọgbọ nke kọmitii nke Global Alliance of National Human Rights Institutions (GANHRI) nke a na-akpọ Kọmitii na-ahụ maka nzere nzere
Kọmitii nta ahụ na-enyocha NHRIs n'ọtụtụ ụkpụrụ, na nnwere onwe site na steeti bụ akụkụ kachasị mkpa nke nyocha ya

Enwere ike igosipụta nnwere onwe site n'ịgbaso ụkpụrụ Paris, dị ka Kọmitii Na-akọwa ya na Ntụle ya. Nyocha nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ụkpụrụ Paris na-enyocha iwu NHRIs, nhọrọ na usoro nhọpụta maka idu ndú, nnwere onwe ego na nchịkwa, na ikike ikike mmadụ ha, na mgbakwunye na omume ha dị ka ndị na-akwalite ikike mmadụ na ndị na-echebe.
